attributes.action: Stop neurofibromatosis being classed as cosmetic. When tumors need to be removed
attributes.background: Patients are being refused to have these tumors removed as they are being classed as cosmetic. They can be painful and it is ridiculous that they are being classed as cosmetic

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for medical decisions about how someone's condition should be treated.

You can find out more about how the NHS approaches neurofibromatosis here :

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/neurofibromatosis-type-1/
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/neurofibromatosis-type-2/
